element.definition: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure.
element.comment: This element is labeled as a modifier because the status contains codes that mark the resource as not currently valid.

binding.description: The type of the measure report
